ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: CASE( TEXT(StageName), "Qualification", 1, "Site Visit", 2, "Load Calculation", 3, "Proposal/Price Quote", 4, "Negotiation/Review", 5, "Closed Won", 6, "Closed Lost", 7, 0 ) < CASE( TEXT(PRIORVALUE(StageName)), "Qualification", 1, "Site Visit", 2, "Load Calculation", 3, "Proposal/Price Quote", 4, "Negotiation/Review", 5, "Closed Won", 6, "Closed Lost", 7, 0 )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Can't change the stage in backward Direction
